<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Instructs this RTDyldLinkingLayer2 instance to override the symbol flags</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// returned by RuntimeDyld for any given object file with the flags supplied</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// by the MaterializationResponsibility instance. This is a workaround to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// support symbol visibility in COFF, which does not use the libObject&#39;s</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// SF&#95;Exported flag. Use only when generating / adding COFF object files.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// FIXME: We should be able to remove this if/when COFF properly tracks</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// exported symbols.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/rtdyldobjectlinkinglayer">RTDyldObjectLinkingLayer</a> &amp;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">this</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// If set, this RTDyldObjectLinkingLayer instance will claim responsibility</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// for any symbols provided by a given object file that were not already in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// the MaterializationResponsibility instance. Setting this flag allows</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// higher-level program representations (e.g. LLVM IR) to be added based on</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// only a subset of the symbols they provide, without having to write</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// intervening layers to scan and add the additional symbols. This trades</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// diagnostic quality for convenience however: If all symbols are enumerated</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// up-front then clashes can be detected and reported early (and usually</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// deterministically). If this option is set, clashes for the additional</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// symbols may not be detected until late, and detection may depend on</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// the flow of control through JIT&#39;d code. Use with care.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/rtdyldobjectlinkinglayer">RTDyldObjectLinkingLayer</a> &amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/rtdyldobjectlinkinglayer/#aa5fd9509ea64f5d3780326dea9b50424"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/rtdyldobjectlinkinglayer/#aa5fd9509ea64f5d3780326dea9b50424">setAutoClaimResponsibilityForObjectSymbols</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> AutoClaimObjectSymbols) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlight">    this-&gt;AutoClaimObjectSymbols = AutoClaimObjectSymbols;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">this</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
